source_item.name: Lesser Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1.4 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 637,991.

Set: When your Power Word: Shield is completely absorbed on an ally, they are granted Insurance! at 40% effectiveness. Allies with your Insurance! or absorption effects receive 15% increased healing from you.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Court Patron's Top Hat

spells.description: Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 128,227 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1.4 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 637,991.

Set: When your Power Word: Shield is completely absorbed on an ally, they are granted Insurance! at 40% effectiveness. Allies with your Insurance! or absorption effects receive 15% increased healing from you.

spells.description: Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,934 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 209 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your spells have a chance to imbue the wax, causing it to form into a blazing candle for 15 sec which increases your Versatility by 3,718, further increased by 977 while you remain within its light.
Equip: Damaging a target has a low chance to call upon the power of the Blessed Weapon Grip, granting you 10 stacks that increase your highest secondary stat by 185. These stacks fade over 30 sec.
